description: Some accuse the singer of stoking Albanian nationalism, while others say she is defending people's rights.
title: Dua Lipa sparks controversy with 'Greater Albania' map tweet
title_page: Dua Lipa sparks controversy with 'Greater Albania' map tweet - BBC News
maintext: "We all deserve to be proud of our ethnicity and where we are from," she added in a later statement. "I simply want my country to be represented on a map and to be able to speak with pride and joy about my Albanian roots."
